name: Netifi
description: Netifi is a cloud-native application platform, that dramatically reduces operational overhead and speeds development with AI-driven management and reactive software components.
solutions: We used Abstract as a version control tool and a Sketch files manager. This reduced the time to create the design and made this process easier and more comfortable.
outcome: Valor Software team fully designed the MVP version of Netifi application and created different promo materials, including banners, brochures, flyers and business cards.
